cz.syntea.xdef.model

Interface XMDebugInfo


  • public interface XMDebugInfo
    Debug information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      XMStatementInfo getInfo(int codeAdr)
      Get statement information corresponding to the code address.
      XMStatementInfo[] getStatementInfo()
      Get array of all statement information objects.
      XMStatementInfo getStatementInfo(long line, long column, java.lang.String sourceID, java.lang.String xdName)
      Get statement information according to the source position.
      XMStatementInfo[] getStatementInfo(long line, java.lang.String xdName)
      Get array of statement information objects assigned to given X-definition and line.
      XMStatementInfo nextStatementInfo(XMStatementInfo si)
      Get statement information of the next statement after argument.
      XMStatementInfo prevStatementInfo(XMStatementInfo si)
      Get statement information of the previous statement before argument.

    • Method Detail

      • getInfo

        XMStatementInfo getInfo(int codeAdr)
        Get statement information corresponding to the code address.
        Parameters:
        codeAdr - Code address.
        Returns:
        XMStatementInfo object or null.

      • nextStatementInfo

        XMStatementInfo nextStatementInfo(XMStatementInfo si)
        Get statement information of the next statement after argument.
        Parameters:
        si - XMStatementInfo object or null.
        Returns:
        next XMStatementInfo object after argument or null.

      • prevStatementInfo

        XMStatementInfo prevStatementInfo(XMStatementInfo si)
        Get statement information of the previous statement before argument.
        Parameters:
        si - XMStatementInfo object or null.
        Returns:
        previous XMStatementInfo object before argument or null.

      • getStatementInfo

        XMStatementInfo getStatementInfo(long line,
                                 long column,
                                 java.lang.String sourceID,
                                 java.lang.String xdName)
        Get statement information according to the source position.
        Parameters:
        line - source line.
        column - source column.
        sourceID - sourceID (pathname, URL, or sourceID) (may be null).
        xdName - name of X-definition (may be null).
        Returns:
        XMStatementInfo object or null.

      • getStatementInfo

        XMStatementInfo[] getStatementInfo(long line,
                                   java.lang.String xdName)
        Get array of statement information objects assigned to given X-definition and line.
        Parameters:
        line - source line.
        xdName - name of X-definition.
        Returns:
        array XMStatementInfo objects (if no statement information is found the array is empty).

      • getStatementInfo

        XMStatementInfo[] getStatementInfo()
        Get array of all statement information objects.
        Returns:
        array of XMStatementInfo objects.
